title: Walk-In COVID-19 Vaccine Events | Atrium Heath
description: In addition to COVID-19 vaccine appointments, Atrium Health welcomes walk-ins at vaccination events. Find the next event near you, and get your COVID-19 vaccine
cleaned_text: At this time, Atrium Health is not hosting walk-in COVID-19 vaccine events. Since the beginning of the pandemic, we've adapted our services to best meet the needs of our community. During earlier phases, walk-in events helped improve access to COVID-19 vaccines. And while COVID-19 is still spreading, we're currently able to meet the need for vaccination in our doctor's offices. To get a COVID-19 vaccine, please schedule an appointment. You can pick the time and place that work for you. Follow the steps below to schedule your COVID-19 vaccine now. Follow the steps below. Step 1: Log in to [MyAtriumHealth](https://my.atriumhealth.org/MyAtriumHealth/Authentication/Login?).+ Step 2: Click on Schedule COVID-19 Vaccination.* Step 3: Click on COVID-19 Vaccination. Step 4: Answer a few quick questions, then schedule your vaccine! You can also call [704-468-8888](tel:704-468-8888) to schedule your COVID-19 vaccine. +If you are under the age of 18 and do not have a MyAtriumHealth account, please schedule your COVID-19 vaccine [here](https://my.atriumhealth.org/myatriumhealth/covid19) or call [704-468-8888](tel:7044688888). * If you are using the MyAtriumHealth app, click on See All Appointments and then Schedule an Appointment.
